# Task: Add Code Coverage Reporting Infrastructure

## Objective

Add code coverage reporting infrastructure to improve test visibility and quality metrics.

## Requirements

1. Set up coverage collection for tests
2. Configure coverage reporting in CI
3. Add coverage badges or summary to README
4. Configure minimum coverage thresholds if appropriate

## Context

The project needs visibility into test coverage to identify untested code and maintain quality standards.

## Expected Output

- Coverage configuration files
- CI workflow updates for coverage collection
- Coverage reporting/visualization setup
- Documentation updates

## Success Criteria

- Coverage data collected when tests run
- Coverage reports generated in CI
- Coverage metrics visible to developers
- No false positives or configuration errors
